```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
txhousing |> 
  filter(city=="Houston") |> 
  group_by(year) |> 
  summarize(sales=sum(sales)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x=year, y=sales)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    ggtitle("Annual Houses Sold in Houston, TX")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](lab02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
